title: Index Error during when converting  detections to tracklets

labels.name: more-data-requested-by-us
labels.description: We would like to get more data to answer

body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

_Note: I am using the DLC GUI_

I trained a multi-animal network with two individuals and a number of unique body parts for corner and object detection. On the 'Analyze videos' tab of the GUI, I am able to run 'Step 1: Analyze Videos' and output labelled versions of those videos. The predictions look good on the output videos. When running 'Step 2: Convert to tracklets', I get an Index Error originating in `pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py`

Maybe important to note is that I only have two multi-animal body parts per individual. This could be increased, but the individuals of interest are very small in each frame.

### Operating System

Windows 10

### DeepLabCut version

2.2.02

### DeepLabCut mode

multi animal

### Device type

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080

### Steps To Reproduce

1. DLC-GPU environment installed from the supplied DEEPLABCUT.yaml file.
2. Train and evaluate multi-animal network
3. Under analyze videos tab of GUI, run Step 2: Convert to Tracklets
4. See log:

### Relevant log output

```shell
Analyzing D:\dlc_vr_arena_twocrickets\ARPrey-Matt-2021-09-14\test-videos\08_10_2021_12_24_45_ARPrey_DG_210203_a_succ_camo_crickettexture_twocrickets_capturelight_sl75_led25DLC_dlcrnetms5_ARPreySep14shuffle1_100000.h5
0it [00:00, ?it/s]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\mmccann\repos\DeepLabCut\deeplabcut\gui\analyze_videos.py", line 414, in convert2_tracklets
    deeplabcut.convert_detections2tracklets(
  File "C:\Users\mmccann\repos\DeepLabCut\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\predict_videos.py", line 1458, in convert_detections2tracklets
    ass.assemble()
  File "C:\Users\mmccann\repos\DeepLabCut\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 737, in assemble
    assemblies, unique = self._assemble(data_dict, i)
  File "C:\Users\mmccann\repos\DeepLabCut\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 654, in _assemble
    p = max(self.calc_link_probability(link), 0.001)
  File "C:\Users\mmccann\repos\DeepLabCut\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 329, in calc_link_probability
    sigma = self._kde.covariance[i, j]
IndexError: index 1 is out of bounds for axis 1 with size 1
```


### Anything else?

_No response_
